title: SM Stirling - The General (Raj Whitehall) series
description:
The General (Raj Whitehall) series

Author - SM Stirling

Format - epub


Military officer Raj Whitehall is roaming through catacombs of the planet Bellevue when he discovers the computer, Battle Central, a relic from the Golden Age before the planets fall a thousand years earlier. Central decides Raj is the one to carry out a mission,and by showing him what will happen to the planet without intervention. Central convinces Raj to save the Civil Government from corruption and bandits. With the computers guidance, Raj proposes a battle plan and soon sets out to conquer the enemies, who would destroy Bellevue, while others plot against him from within. Central gives Raj advice from time to time by demonstrating for him in his mind's eye, what could happen if Raj makes the wrong strategic decision.


David Drake -:

The General series began with The Forge in 1991 and has now reached nine volumes (with a tenth plotted). Using the life of the Byzantine general Belisarius as my matrix, I plotted a series of (originally) four books set in a world which has recovered to roughly the technological level of the 19th century after the galactic civilization collapsed.
Because the series (developed from my plots by Steve Stirling) was so successful, I did additional plots.


01 The Forge
02 The Hammer
03 The Anvil
04 The Steel
05 The Sword
06 The Chosen
07 The Reformer
08 The Tyrant
09 The Heretic
